snippet: The Bulgarian grandmaster Ivan Cheparinov ignored several principles of the game in a recent tournament, with widely different results.
abstract: Dylan Loeb McClain Chess column on Bulgarian grandmaster Ivan Cheparinov at 14th Karpov Poikovsky tournament in Russia.
lead_paragraph: The Bulgarian grandmaster Ivan Cheparinov ignored several principles of the game in a recent tournament, with widely different results.

headline.print_headline: The Risks and Rewards Of Defying the Basics
headline.main: The Risks and Rewards of Defying the Basics
